fields.name: Abilites:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to transport two Pale Moon members.
- Use 2 bees to redirect all non-Pale Moon abilities used on up to three players to yourself tonight.
- Use 3 bees to cause a player to deal a Powerful attack to their first target in addition to their ability's effect tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
- Once the PMCS begins, you gain 3 bees immediately and an additional bee every night for the rest of the game.
